songs.title: Silent Night (Live at the Cathedral of St. John The Divine)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Silent night
Holy night
All is calm
All is bright
'Round yon virgin Mother and Child
Holy infant so tender and mild
Sleep in heavenly peace
Sleep in heavenly peace

[Verse 2]
Silent night
Holy night
Son of God
Oh, love's pure light
Radiant beams from Thy holy face
With the dawn of redeeming grace
Jesus, Jesus Lord at Thy, Thy birth
Oh, Jesus Lord at Thy birth

[Outro]
Sleep (Birth)
Sleep
Sleep in heavenly peace
Sleep, sleep, sleep (Sleep)
Sleep in heavenly, heavenly, heavenly peace
Peace
Peace
Sleep (Heavenly peace)
Oh, sleep in heavenly peace

[Spoken]
Thank you
